general information: Marketing Information This monitor is best suited for individual study and entertainment, spreadsheet users and web browsing. The Lenovo LS1922 Wide is a 18.5" Monitor which adopts the latest W-LED backlight technology and provides great display quality and saves power consumption up to 40% compared to previous product. The Lenovo LS1922 Wide is packed with green features including being mercury-free by adopting white LED backlights, arsenic-free glass, and meeting the latest Energy-Star standard and being TCO Displays 5.2 compliant. The Lenovo LS1922 Wide monitor provides 1366 x 768 resolution. This widescreen monitor improves efficiency with easy viewing of multiple applications. The LS1922 Wide monitor coordinates with any Lenovo ThinkCentre, IdeaCentre. It matches the Lenovo design and comes in a black finish.
